duties_responsibilities.duty: Build new services from vision to production-ready systems in a fast-paced, Agile environment.
Create engaging customer experiences using front-end development technologies in SharePoint Online and Power Platform.
Work on projects that meet challenges in the DoD, collaborating with the team to build automated business processes and sites in SharePoint and Microsoft 365.
Ensure accessibility for all users by developing a front end that functions across browsers, platforms, and devices while meeting accessibility and security requirements.
Craft custom Microsoft 365 tools and capabilities to meet client requirements.
Perform administrative functions to support client activities in the Microsoft 365 Flank Speed environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, or Mathematics (Master's Preferred)
